0871A46B.Toast: This mysterious old shrine calls out for aid.

6274A1FB.Phase33Description: Despite Izel’s condescension, I have found her lost phylactery. She has asked me to place in front of the shrine she inhabits.

92C33198.Phase12Description:
The fisherman in Gea Kul was correct – there is a talking shrine. The womanly voice claims to be an ancient mage trapped in the rock.

Freedom for her may lie in the Conclave. I am to seek out a magical vessel hidden somewhere in the caves.

B12EDDB8.Phase21Description: I’ve done all Izel has asked of me. I should speak to her and inquire what else is needed for her freedom.
